title: Scrapbook, 1961
medium:
Medium: paper, fabric
Technique: various weave techniques
inscribed: stamped in gold on front cover, "THE CAPITOL and THE WHITE HOUSE FABRIC by SCHUMACHER.
dimensions: Closed book: 46 x 62 x 2.5 cm (18 1/8 x 24 7/16 x 1 in. )
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Scrapbook containing 34 pages of photos, text and fabric samples showing the Schumacher fabrics used in the Capitol and the White House. Many of the samples in the scrapbook are not included in the rest of the Hasenclever gift.

tombstone.epitaph:

1961. Medium: paper, fabric
